testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the pay grades
testcase.name: Verify the add pay grade and add currency functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in Pay Grades page........................................passed When the user clicks on Add button in Pay Grades page.......................passed Then the user is in Add Pay Grade Page......................................passed When user adds the parameters "Grade_Bala"..................................passed And the user clicks on Save button in Add Pay Grades Page...................passed Then the Edit Pay Grade page and Currencies should be visible...............passed When the user clicks on Add button near Currencies..........................passed Then the Add Currency page should be visible................................passed When user adds the parameters "INR - Indian Rupee", "10000.00", "25000.00"..passed And the user clicks on Save button in Add Currency Page.....................passed Then the newly added parameters "Indian Rupee", "10000.00", "25000.00" are visible.passed When the user clicks button cancel in Edit Pay Grade page...................passed Then the newly added pay grade "Grade_Bala" and currency "Indian Rupee" is visible.passed
